verses.verse: A Psalm of David. <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, I have <S%H7121>called<s%> upon <S%H2363>thee<s%>; Make haste unto <S%H238>me<s%>: Give ear unto my <S%H6963>voice<s%>, when I call unto <S%H7121>thee<s%>.

Let my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> be set <S%H3559>forth<s%> as <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4864>thee<s%>; The lifting up of my <S%H3709>hands<s%> as the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H4503>sacrifice<s%>.
Set <S%H7896><s%> a <S%H8108>watch<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, before my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; <S%H5341>Keep<s%> the <S%H1817>door<s%> of my <S%H8193>lips<s%>.

Incline <S%H5186><s%> not my <S%H3820>heart<s%> to any <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%>, To <S%H5953>practise<s%> <S%H5949>deeds<s%> of <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> With <S%H376>men<s%> that <S%H5949>work<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%>: And let me not <S%H3898>eat<s%> of their <S%H4516>dainties<s%>.

Let the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H1986>smite<s%> <S%H2617>me<s%>, it shall be a kindness; And let him <S%H3198>reprove<s%> <S%H8081>me<s%>, it shall be as oil upon the <S%H7218>head<s%>; Let not my <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H5106>refuse<s%> <S%H7451>it<s%>: For even in their wickedness shall my prayer <S%H8605>continue<s%>.
Their <S%H8199>judges<s%> are <S%H8058>thrown<s%> down by the <S%H3027>sides<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock<s%>; And they shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H561>words<s%>; For they are <S%H5276>sweet<s%>.
As when one <S%H6398>ploweth<s%> and <S%H1234>cleaveth<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, Our <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H6340>scattered<s%> at the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>.
For mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are unto <S%H3069>thee<s%>, O Jehovah the <S%H136>Lord<s%>: In thee do I take <S%H2620>refuge<s%>; <S%H6168>leave<s%> not my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H6168>destitute<s%>.
Keep <S%H8104><s%> me from the <S%H3027>snare<s%> which they have <S%H3369>laid<s%> for <S%H4170>me<s%>, And from the gins of the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%>.
Let the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> into their own <S%H4364>nets<s%>, Whilst that I <S%H3162>withal<s%> <S%H5674>escape<s%>.
